name: shazam
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to say that something happens very quickly and easily, as if by magic: She wished that someone would invent a button that you pressed, and shazam, you were tucked in bed, washed and with your teeth brushed. Put all the ingredients together, cook for an hour, and shazam - a delicious spicy soup.
More examplesFewer examplesIf you call your phone company and whine a bit, shazam, you get an extra 100 minutes per month for the same money!Technically, it isn't a sports site. But type in any sort of a sports search, and, well, shazam. Joey's going to a basketball game - two nights in a row. Shazam!
